session_info.name: WEXPLM - Invited Orals: Photon Sources and Electron Accelerators

papers.title: XFEL Operational Flexibility due to the Dechirper System
authors: The RadiaBeam/SLAC dechirper was installed to demonstrate the concept of using wakefields from a corrugated structure to change the energy profile along an electron bunch. Since installation
the system has allowed a large number of additional XFEL operating modes including fresh-slice two-color or three color operation
etc. This talk will discuss the results from using the dechirper system and possible implementation issues related to the high-rate LCLS-II.
A. A. et al. Nat. Photon. 10
institutions: Funding: U.S.Department of Energy, Office of Science, Laboratory Directed Research and Development (LDRD) program at SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory, under Contract No. DE-AC02-76SF00515.
